001package eu.andredick;
002
003import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.ACOAlgorithm;
004import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.Statistics;
005import eu.andredick.aco.ant.ACOAnt;
006import eu.andredick.aco.combination.CombinationSum;
007import eu.andredick.aco.construction.ConstructionFromElements;
008import eu.andredick.aco.heuristic.HeuristicInfoSet;
009import eu.andredick.aco.localsearch.LocalSearchAntCover;
010import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.MasterProcessElitist;
011import eu.andredick.aco.nextstep.NextStepStrategyOnSubsets;
012import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneperception.PerceptionSimple;
013import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneupdate.PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets;
014import eu.andredick.aco.solutionquality.SolutionQualityMin;
015import eu.andredick.aco.termination.TerminationCriterion;
016import eu.andredick.scp.SCPSolution;
017import eu.andredick.tools.ChartTools;
018import eu.andredick.tools.MatConvert;
019
020import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.MasterProcessBasic;
021import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneassociation.PheromoneOnSubsets;
022import eu.andredick.scp.SCProblem;
023import eu.andredick.tools.orlib.OrlibConverter;
024
025public class Main {
026
027    public static void main(String[] args) {
028        // 通过 .mat 文件设置覆盖矩阵设置覆盖矩阵
029        SCProblem problem = MatConvert.Mat_to_SCP("Coverage.mat");
030        // 使用orlib库中的数据集初始化特定的覆盖问题，涉及覆盖矩阵
031//        SCProblem problem = new OrlibConverter().getProblem("scp41");
032        // 设置信息素关联组件
033        PheromoneOnSubsets pheromone_association = new PheromoneOnSubsets(problem);
034        // 判定解的质量，用于信息素的标记
035        SolutionQualityMin solution_quality = new SolutionQualityMin();
036        // 设置信息素标记组件
037        PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets pheromoneupdate = new PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets(pheromone_association, solution_quality);
038        // 设置信息素感知组件
039        PerceptionSimple pheromone_perception = new PerceptionSimple();
040        // 启发式信息设置
041        HeuristicInfoSet heuristics = new HeuristicInfoSet();
042        // 信息素与启发式信息结合组件
043        CombinationSum combination_rule = new CombinationSum((float)0.5);
044        // 设置候选集选择组件
045        NextStepStrategyOnSubsets nextstep_strategy = new NextStepStrategyOnSubsets(pheromone_association, pheromone_perception, heuristics, combination_rule, (float)0.5);
046        // 设置解的构造组件
047        ConstructionFromElements construction = new ConstructionFromElements(nextstep_strategy);
048        //设置局部搜索组件
049        LocalSearchAntCover local_search = new LocalSearchAntCover();
050        // 设置蚂蚁种群数量
051        ACOAnt[] ants = new ACOAnt[500];
052        for (int i = 0; i < ants.length; i++) {
053            ants[i] = new ACOAnt<SCPSolution, SCProblem>(problem, pheromoneupdate, construction, local_search);
054        }
055        // 设置最大迭代次数
056        TerminationCriterion termination_criterion = new TerminationCriterion(100);
057        //主进程由 ACOAlgorithm 调用执行
058        MasterProcessElitist master_process = new MasterProcessElitist(pheromone_association, ants, termination_criterion);
059//        MasterProcessBasic master_process = new MasterProcessBasic(pheromone_association, ants, termination_criterion);
060        ACOAlgorithm aco_algorithm = new ACOAlgorithm(master_process);
061        aco_algorithm.go();
062        // 获取统计信息
063        Statistics statistics = aco_algorithm.getStatistics();
064        float[] min_array = statistics.getIterationMinValuesArray();
065        //可视化迭代结果
066        ChartTools chart = new ChartTools("迭代最优值", "iterations", "value");
067        chart.addDataSeries("ants", min_array);
068    }
069}
